SCTX:
Begin PlagueNerile


short nolore
short doonce

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_CrimsonPlague" >= 10 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_CrimsonPlague" < 170 )
			Journal MS_CrimsonPlague 200
		endif
	endif
endif


if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_CrimsonPlague" == 30 )
		if ( doonce == 0 )
			StartCombat rat_plague_hall1a
			set doonce to 1
		endif
	endif
endif



End PlagueNerile
